name: Blink (itch) (samloeschen)
description:
Top down action dashing game where you must shift states to destroy enemies

Score and combo are currently meaningless but make you feel good inside

Game over when you're out of hearts and get hit

/-----------------------------------------\

Controls:

Move - Left stick/WASD

Blink - A button / LMB

Switch States - R1 / RMB

Gamepad recommended 👍

\-----------------------------------------/

/------------------------------------------------------------------------------\

Pro Tips!

-Use a controller

-Blinking is reckless

-You can change states while blinking

-Killing an enemy knocks back enemies of the opposite state

-Combos end if you lose your blink chain or if you take damage

-Use a controller

\------------------------------------------------------------------------------/

Programming and animation by @samloeschen

Score and illustration by @FliteUS

Originally made with <3 for Ludum Dare 35!
